Class AssignmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.labconnect.webapp.controller.AssignmentController

public class AssignmentController
extends java.lang.Object

      • getAssignment

        @GetMapping("/api/assignments/{assignmentId}")
public Assignment getAssignment​(@PathVariable
                                org.bson.types.ObjectId assignmentId,
                                org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
        Gets the specified assignment.
        Parameters:
        assignmentId - Id of the assignment
        authentication - Token for authentication request
        Returns:
        The requested assignment

public java.util.List<Assignment> getAssignmentsFor​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)

      • createAssignment

        @PostMapping("/api/assignments")
@Secured("ROLE_INSTRUCTOR")
public Assignment createAssignment​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication,
                                   @RequestParam("instructions-file")
                                   org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile instructions,
                                   @RequestParam("example-implementation")
                                   org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile exampleImplementation,
                                   @RequestParam("tester-class")
                                   org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile testerClass,
                                   @RequestBody
                                   NewAssignment newAssignment)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   BadExampleException
        Creates/POST an assignment with given parameters
        Parameters:
        authentication - Token for authentication request
        instructions - Instructions file for the assignment
        exampleImplementation - The example implementation for the unit test
        testerClass - The tester class for the unit test
        newAssignment - New assignment object
        Returns:
        Constructed assignment object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If processing the instructions fails
        BadExampleException - If the example implementation or the tester do not compile or generate a runtime error (Determined by a non-zero exit code)

      • getInstructionsFile

        public org.springframework.core.io.Resource getInstructionsFile​(@PathVariable
                                                                org.bson.types.ObjectId assignmentId,
                                                                org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the instructions file of the given assignment
        Parameters:
        assignmentId - Id of the assignment
        authentication - Token for authentication request
        Returns:
        Instruction file of the assignment
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is not such assignment

      • getSubmissions

        @GetMapping("/api/assignments/{assignmentId}/submissions")
@Secured({"ROLE_INSTRUCTOR","ROLE_TEACHING_ASSISTANT","ROLE_STUDENT"})
public java.util.List<Submission> getSubmissions​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication,
                                                 @PathVariable
                                                 org.bson.types.ObjectId assignmentId)
        Gets the submissions of an assignment
        Parameters:
        authentication - Token for authentication request
        assignmentId - Id of the assignment
        Returns:
        List of submissions of the specified assignment

      • addAttempt

        @PostMapping("/api/assignments/{assignmentId}/submissions")
@Secured("ROLE_STUDENT")
public Attempt addAttempt​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication,
                          @PathVariable
                          org.bson.types.ObjectId assignmentId,
                          @RequestParam
                          org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile attemptArchive)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Creates/POST an attempt for submission
        Parameters:
        authentication - Token for authentication request
        assignmentId - Id of the assignment
        attemptArchive - The contents of src/ as a ZIP file
        Returns:
        The added attempt
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If processing the archive fails

      • getAttempts

        @GetMapping("/api/assignments/{assignmentId}/submissions/{submissionId}/attempts/")
public java.util.List<Attempt> getAttempts​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication,
                                           @PathVariable
                                           org.bson.types.ObjectId assignmentId,
                                           @PathVariable
                                           org.bson.types.ObjectId submissionId)
        Gets the attempts of a submission
        Parameters:
        authentication - Token for authentication request
        assignmentId - Id of the assignment
        submissionId - Id of the submission
        Returns:
        The list of attempts for the specified assignment and submission

      • getAttemptDetails

        @GetMapping("/api/assignments/{assignmentId}/submissions/{submissionId}/attempts/{attemptId}")
public Attempt getAttemptDetails​(@PathVariable
                                 org.bson.types.ObjectId assignmentId,
                                 @PathVariable
                                 org.bson.types.ObjectId submissionId,
                                 @PathVariable
                                 org.bson.types.ObjectId attemptId)

      • giveFeedbackToAttempt

        @PostMapping("/api/assignments/{assignmentId}/submissions/{submissionId}/attempts/{attemptId}")
public void giveFeedbackToAttempt​(@PathVariable
                                  org.bson.types.ObjectId assignmentId,
                                  @PathVariable
                                  org.bson.types.ObjectId submissionId,
                                  @PathVariable
                                  org.bson.types.ObjectId attemptId,
                                  @RequestBody
                                  Feedback feedback)
        Creates/POST a feedback for the given submission attempt
        Parameters:
        assignmentId - Id of the assignment
        submissionId - Id of the submission
        attemptId - Id of the attempt
        feedback - Feedback which is going to be added to the attempt

      • getAttemptArchive

        @GetMapping("/api/assignments/{assignmentId}/submissions/{submissionId}/attempts/{attemptId}/download")
@Secured("ROLE_TEACHING_ASSISTANT")
public org.springframework.core.io.Resource getAttemptArchive​(@PathVariable
                                                              org.bson.types.ObjectId assignmentId,
                                                              @PathVariable
                                                              org.bson.types.ObjectId submissionId,
                                                              @PathVariable
                                                              org.bson.types.ObjectId attemptId)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Gets attempts archive file from the database of a specific submission of specific assignment
        Parameters:
        assignmentId - Id of the assignment
        submissionId - Id of the submission
        attemptId - Id of the attempt
        Returns:
        Ready to download archive file of attempts
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If archiving the attempt fails

      • addNote

        @PostMapping("/api/assignments/{assignmentId}/submissions/{submissionId}/attempts/{attemptId}/notes")
@Secured("ROLE_STUDENT")
public void addNote​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication,
                    @PathVariable
                    org.bson.types.ObjectId attemptId,
                    @RequestBody
                    Note note)
        Adds/POST note to the specified attempt
        Parameters:
        authentication - Token for authentication request
        attemptId - Id of the attempt
        note - Note which is going to be added to the attempt
